name: Spew
description:
You start with nothing in your belly...

An entry for Ludum Dare 45.

  • https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/spew
  • Note: the PostJamFix version fixes a tiny bug with animations.

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to spew
  • WASD or arrows to control your spew
